attributes.action: Give under 18s a chance to vote for their future.
attributes.background:
Whatever is decided by adults in this country will not only inevitably change the way teenagers and children live, but also could have a permanent effect on their future lives. Even though we are young, our opinion is still valid, we want a voice in the future of our country.
 Our voices matter.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We are not sure exactly what age you would like the voting age to be changed to. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly which age groups you would like to be given voting rights. 

You might also like to sign these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235503
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234119
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/238002
